title: LIS | Integration Performance & Wait Operations Monitor | Studio

options.content:
Dashboard monitors two critical integration issues:

**Section 1: Integration Exceeding 20 Seconds**
- Tracks /api/integration calls with time_taken > 20000ms
- Shows errors by cs_username and Host

**Section 2: Wait Operations Timed Out**
- Tracks ambassador.log timeout events
- Extracts method names from IntegrationService.Controllers.IntegrationController
- Shows errors by method and Host

Auto-refresh: 60s.

Host tiles show count for selected time range; green=0, red>0.
Picker total tiles: green=0, yellow=1-10, red>10.

options.markdown: Dashboard Description | Monitors Integration Performance Issues and Wait Operation Timeouts

viz_waitop_by_host.title: Wait Operations Timed Out Errors by Host (stacked)

viz_waitop_by_method.title: Wait Operations Timed OutWait Operations Timed Out Errors by Wait Operation Method (stacked columns)

viz_waitop_errors_picker.title: Errors Count | Wait Operations Timed Out (Based on time picker)

viz_waitop_events_table.title: Wait Operation Events - Timed Out (Based on Main Tab Time Range)

options.query: search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-3d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors

ds_7LfEqkQL_ds_integration_by_time_range.name: Integration Errors by cs_username (picker-aware with zero-fill)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$graph_time_range.earliest$", l="$graph_time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-4h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times, cs_username="ZZZTIMELINE", count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time cs_username count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | eval marker="event" | fields _time cs_username marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, 0) | stats sum(count) as count by _time cs_username | xyseries _time cs_username count | fields - ZZZTIMELINE | fillnull value=0

ds_9WtyYAi9_ds_integration_by_time_range.name: Integration Errors by Time Range (picker-aware with zero-fill) copy 1

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$graph_time_range.earliest$", l="$graph_time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-4h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval rangelist="0-5 seconds,6-10 seconds,11-20 seconds,20-30 seconds,30+ seconds" | makemv delim="," rangelist | mvexpand rangelist | eval time_range=rangelist, count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time time_range count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | eval time_taken_sec=time_taken/1000 | eval time_range=case(time_taken_sec<=5, "0-5 seconds", time_taken_sec<=10, "6-10 seconds", time_taken_sec<=20, "11-20 seconds", time_taken_sec<=30, "20-30 seconds", 1=1, "30+ seconds") | eval marker="event" | fields _time time_range marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time time_range | xyseries _time time_range count | eval "0-5 seconds"=coalesce('0-5 seconds',0) | eval "6-10 seconds"=coalesce('6-10 seconds',0) | eval "11-20 seconds"=coalesce('11-20 seconds',0) | eval "20-30 seconds"=coalesce('20-30 seconds',0) | eval "30+ seconds"=coalesce('30+ seconds',0) | fields _time "30+ seconds" "20-30 seconds" "11-20 seconds" "6-10 seconds" "0-5 seconds" | sort 0 _time
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-24h latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors

search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-7d latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method | stats count as total_errors

search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-4h latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method | stats count as total_errors

ds_VJ3wpfpa_ds_integration_by_time_range.name: Integration Errors by Time Range (Main Tab Time Range)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval rangelist="0-5 seconds,6-10 seconds,11-20 seconds,20-30 seconds,30+ seconds" | makemv delim="," rangelist | mvexpand rangelist | eval time_range=rangelist, count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time time_range count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | eval time_taken_sec=time_taken/1000 | eval time_range=case(time_taken_sec<=5, "0-5 seconds", time_taken_sec<=10, "6-10 seconds", time_taken_sec<=20, "11-20 seconds", time_taken_sec<=30, "20-30 seconds", 1=1, "30+ seconds") | eval marker="event" | fields _time time_range marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time time_range | xyseries _time time_range count | eval "0-5 seconds"=coalesce('0-5 seconds',0) | eval "6-10 seconds"=coalesce('6-10 seconds',0) | eval "11-20 seconds"=coalesce('11-20 seconds',0) | eval "20-30 seconds"=coalesce('20-30 seconds',0) | eval "30+ seconds"=coalesce('30+ seconds',0) | fields _time "30+ seconds" "20-30 seconds" "11-20 seconds" "6-10 seconds" "0-5 seconds" | sort 0 _time

search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-12h latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method | stats count as total_errors

search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-24h latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method | stats count as total_errors

ds_fullpage_integration_by_host.name: Integration Errors by Host (fullpage time range)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$fullpage_time_range.earliest$", l="$fullpage_time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-12h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval hostlist="plisweb04 plisweb05 plisweb06 plisweb07" | makemv delim=" " hostlist | mvexpand hostlist | eval host=lower(trim(hostlist)), count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time host count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken, host | where time_taken > 20000 | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | where host IN ("plisweb04","plisweb05","plisweb06","plisweb07") | eval marker="event" | fields _time host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time host | xyseries _time host count | sort 0 _time

e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval marker="scaffold" | fields _time time_range count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | eval time_taken_sec=time_taken/1000 | eval time_range=case(time_taken_sec<=5, "0-5 seconds", time_taken_sec<=10, "6-10 seconds", time_taken_sec<=20, "11-20 seconds", time_taken_sec<=30, "20-30 seconds", 1=1, "30+ seconds") | eval marker="event" | fields _time time_range marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR time_range | xyseries _time time_range count | eval "0-5 seconds"=coalesce('0-5 seconds',0) | eval "6-10 seconds"=coalesce('6-10 seconds',0) | eval "11-20 seconds"=coalesce('11-20 seconds',0) | eval "20-30 seconds"=coalesce('20-30 seconds',0) | eval "30+ seconds"=coalesce('30+ seconds',0) | fields _time "30+ seconds" "20-30 seconds" "11-20 seconds" "6-10 seconds" "0-5 seconds" | sort 0 _time

ds_fullpage_waitop_by_host.name: Wait Operation Errors by Host (fullpage time range)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$fullpage_time_range.earliest$", l="$fullpage_time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-12h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval hostlist="plisweb04 plisweb05 plisweb06 plisweb07" | makemv delim=" " hostlist | mvexpand hostlist | eval host=lower(trim(hostlist)), count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time host count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-366d latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method, host | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | where host IN ("plisweb04","plisweb05","plisweb06","plisweb07") | eval marker="event" | fields _time host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time host | xyseries _time host count | sort 0 _time

search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-12h latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors

ds_integration_by_host.name: Integration Errors by Host (picker-aware with zero-fill)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval hostlist="plisweb04 plisweb05 plisweb06 plisweb07" | makemv delim=" " hostlist | mvexpand hostlist | eval host=lower(trim(hostlist)), count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time host count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken, host | where time_taken > 20000 | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | where host IN ("plisweb04","plisweb05","plisweb06","plisweb07") | eval marker="event" | fields _time host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time host | xyseries _time host count | sort 0 _time

ds_integration_by_time_range.name: Integration Errors by Time Range (picker-aware with zero-fill)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$graph_time_range.earliest$", l="$graph_time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-4h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval rangelist="0-5 seconds,6-10 seconds,11-20 seconds,20-30 seconds,30+ seconds" | makemv delim="," rangelist | mvexpand rangelist | eval time_range=rangelist, count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time time_range count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | eval time_taken_sec=time_taken/1000 | eval time_range=case(time_taken_sec<=5, "0-5 seconds", time_taken_sec<=10, "6-10 seconds", time_taken_sec<=20, "11-20 seconds", time_taken_sec<=30, "20-30 seconds", 1=1, "30+ seconds") | eval marker="event" | fields _time time_range marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time time_range | xyseries _time time_range count | eval "0-5 seconds"=coalesce('0-5 seconds',0) | eval "6-10 seconds"=coalesce('6-10 seconds',0) | eval "11-20 seconds"=coalesce('11-20 seconds',0) | eval "20-30 seconds"=coalesce('20-30 seconds',0) | eval "30+ seconds"=coalesce('30+ seconds',0) | fields _time "30+ seconds" "20-30 seconds" "11-20 seconds" "6-10 seconds" "0-5 seconds" | sort 0 _time

ds_integration_by_username.name: Integration Errors by cs_username (picker-aware with time scaffold)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times, cs_username="ZZZTIMELINE", count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time cs_username count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | eval marker="event" | fields _time cs_username marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, 0) | stats sum(count) as count by _time cs_username | xyseries _time cs_username count | fields - ZZZTIMELINE | fillnull value=0
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-10m latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-15m latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-30m latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-5m latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors
search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-60m latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | stats count as total_errors

| makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval marker="meta", _time=0 | fields _time start end marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time, cs_uri_stem, cs_username, time_taken | where time_taken > 20000 | eval marker="event" | fields _time marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end | eval is_event=if(marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end,1,0) | stats sum(is_event) as count | eval color=case(count=0,"#118832", count<=10,"#f5c542", 1=1,"#d41f1f") | table count color

| makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-4h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval marker="meta", _time=0 | fields _time start end marker | append [ search index=plis_access "/api/integration" earliest=-366d latest=now | table _time cs_uri_stem cs_username time_taken host | where time_taken > 20000 | eval marker="event" | fields _time cs_uri_stem cs_username time_taken host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end | where marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end | eval time_taken_sec=round(time_taken/1000,2) | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | fields _time cs_uri_stem cs_username time_taken_sec host | rename _time as "Time" cs_uri_stem as "URI" cs_username as "Username" time_taken_sec as "Time Taken (sec)" host as "Host" | sort - Time

ds_waitop_by_host.name: Wait Operation Errors by Host (picker-aware with zero-fill)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times | eval hostlist="plisweb04 plisweb05 plisweb06 plisweb07" | makemv delim=" " hostlist | mvexpand hostlist | eval host=lower(trim(hostlist)), count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time host count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-366d latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method, host | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | where host IN ("plisweb04","plisweb05","plisweb06","plisweb07") | eval marker="event" | fields _time host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, count) | stats sum(count) as count by _time host | xyseries _time host count | sort 0 _time

ds_waitop_by_method.name: Wait Operation Errors by Method (picker-aware with time scaffold)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-1h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval range=end-start | eval step=case(range<86400,60, range<=604800,300, 1=1,900) | eval start=floor(start/step)*step, end=floor(end/step)*step | eval times=mvrange(start, end+step, step) | mvexpand times | eval _time=times, method="ZZZTIMELINE", count=0, marker="scaffold" | fields _time method count start end step marker | append [ search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-366d latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time, user_id, method | eval marker="event" | fields _time method marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end max(step) as step | where marker="scaffold" OR (marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end) | eval _time=if(marker="event", floor(_time/step)*step, _time) | eval count=if(marker="event", 1, 0) | stats sum(count) as count by _time method | xyseries _time method count | fields - ZZZTIMELINE | fillnull value=0

ds_waitop_events_table.name: Wait Operation Events Table (time picker range)

options.query: | makeresults | eval e="$time_range.earliest$", l="$time_range.latest$" | rex field=e "^(?<e_epoch>\\d+)$" | rex field=l "^(?<l_epoch>\\d+)$" | eval start=case(isnotnull(e_epoch), tonumber(e_epoch), match(e,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(e,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), isnull(e) OR e="", relative_time(now(), "-4h"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), e)) | eval end=case(isnotnull(l_epoch), tonumber(l_epoch), l="now" OR l="", now(), match(l,"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}T"), strptime(l,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N%Z"), 1=1, relative_time(now(), l)) | eval marker="meta", _time=0 | fields _time start end marker | append [ search index=plis source=*ambassador.log "The wait operation timed out" earliest=-366d latest=now | rex field=_raw "at IntegrationService\\.Controllers\\.IntegrationController\\.(?<method>.*?\\))" | table _time user_id method host | eval marker="event" | fields _time user_id method host marker ] | eventstats max(start) as start max(end) as end | where marker="event" AND _time>=start AND _time<=end | eval host=lower(trim(host)) | eval host=mvindex(split(host,"."),0) | fields _time user_id method host | rename _time as "Time" user_id as "User ID" method as "Method" host as "Host" | sort - Time
